overview: Combining commentary from renowned Egyptian scholars with meticulous computer animation, this History Channel documentary travels more than 3,000 years into the past to explore the world of the legendary King Tut. The program brings to life the never-before-seen details of Tut's tomb and also examines the folklore surrounding the boy king. Award-winning actor Frank Langella narrates this fascinating journey.
title: King Tutankhamun - The Mystery Unsealed
